original_text: Or do you not know that the saints will judge the world? And if the world is to be judged by you, are you incompetent to try trivial cases?
korean_text: 성도가 세상을 판단할 것을 너희가 알지 못하느냐 세상도 너희에게 판단을 받겠거든 지극히 작은 일 판단하기를 감당하지 못하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: that the saints will judge the world?
And if the world is to be judged by you,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만일 세상이 너희에 의해 심판받는다면,

sentences.original_text: are you incompetent to try trivial cases?
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 사소한 사건을 재판하는 것에 무능하냐?
